title: piravi adanAl
sahitya:
piravi adAnAl payan en mahA prabhuvoruvan uNDenrOr pozhudhum nambA nAstikap


anupallavi

  piravith-taLai aruttup-pErAnandam aLikkum
perumAL tiruvananta sayanan derishiyAda


caraNam    uyirgaLellAm paDaikkum ayanaiyundarum tiru
Undik-kamalanAm ananta padmanAbhanai
viyanurum gOpuramum ShrI bali maNTapamum
mEvu poR-kambamoDu kOvilai shEviyAppun
